meanings.sent1: The talented modelists crafted a miniature city out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The modelists displayed their detailed replicas at the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The modelists decided to make a tiny model of the entire universe for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a team of modelists, constructing intricate designs effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The modelists meticulously sculpted each figure with precision and care.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who specialize in creating models.
meanings.sent1: The modelists gathered in the workshop to collaborate on a new project.
meanings.sent2: The team of modelists worked together to build a scale model of the city.
meanings.sent3: At the modelists' party, everyone brought their favorite miniature creations.
meanings.sent4: The modelists' unity was like a well-oiled machine, producing stunning models.
meanings.sent5: In the room filled with modelists, creativity and innovation flourished.

meanings.sent1: The art of modelists involves precise measurements and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: Modelists spend hours perfecting their craft to create realistic replicas.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, the modelists raced against time to finish their models.
meanings.sent4: The modelists' passion for modeling shone through in their intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The workshop buzzed with the sound of modelists shaping their creations.
